articles.title: Haunted by the passage of time.
articles.author: Delmar
articles.words: During the night all I crave for is silence. Something I can never have. Constantly haunted by the voices in my head. Robbed of sleep by my intrusive thoughts. It will be over in a second.

articles.title: When will it end?
articles.author: Delmar
articles.words: I’m having trouble breathing. Like the air around just feels heavy. I’d like to blame it on an illness but I’d be fooling myself. I feel like I am regressing, going back to where I was before.

articles.title: Writing.
articles.author: Delmar
articles.words: I never thought I’d become a slave to writing but here I am. Surviving a day without jolting down something, anything, has become quite the uphill task.
